H0.text: Rice is the plant grown for food.

H1.text: Tobacco is the plant grown for food.

H2.text: Orchid is a plant grown for food.

H3.text: Cotton is the plant that is grown for food.

A4.text: Rice is a cereal grain and in its domesticated form is the staple food of over half of the world's population, particularly in Asia and Africa.
